subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Virginia’s Chris Long is best known as the son of Hall of Fame defensive end Howie Long.  But his play is making it increasingly difficult to overlook him as a top N.F.L. prospect.
snippet: Virginia’s Chris Long is best known as the son of Hall of Fame defensive end Howie Long.  But his play is making it increasingly difficult to overlook him as a top N.F.L. prospect.
